CustomOptOut.ShowEditorDescription: Enable this option to show the "custom css" code in a simple css editor.
CustomOptOut.EditorThemeDescription: Choose a theme for the editor.
CustomOptOut.DefaultCssStylesDescription: This css styles will be used if no page is selected.
CustomOptOut.DefaultCssFileDescription: This css file will be used if no page is selected.
CustomOptOut.EnableJavascriptInjectionDescription: Enable this option to show fields to enter javascript.
